title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama to chat with local LLMs from any Python script.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; npm install ollama to embed local LLMs in Node or browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you swap Ollama-hosted models into any LangChain chain or agent.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that connects to a local Ollama instance; no data leaves your machine.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive TUI for browsing, pulling, and chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and model persistence.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Android compatible) published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama API with async support.

title: ollama-cpp
summary: Lightweight C++17 header-only client for embedded apps wanting to talk to Ollama over HTTP.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or rankers in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of POSIX shell wrappers around curl for quick Ollama scripting without external deps.

title: ollama-dbee
summary: DBeaver VS Code extension that adds SQL query generation and explanation using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI microservice template exposing OpenAI-compatible endpoints backed by Ollama for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that auto-detects and lists local Ollama models for rapid prototyping.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible Ollama binaries with CUDA and ROCm variants.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM power to any server using Ollama.

title: ollama-minecraft
summary: Spigot/Paper plugin letting server admins add NPCs powered by local Ollama models for in-game chat.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate on crates.io for integrating Ollama into systems built with Tokio or Axum.
